quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: You become what you believe.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Wesley Snipes

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Limit your 'always' and your 'nevers'.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You are enough just as you are.
author: Meghan Markle

quote: You don’t have to be perfect to be amazing.
author: Unknown

quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Life is trying things to see if they work.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: You can if you think you can.
author: George Reeves

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Impossible is just an opinion.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: No pressure, no diamonds.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you want to fly, give up everything that weighs you down.
author: Buddha

quote: We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

quote: Your life does not get better by chance; it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Light tomorrow with today.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Do something worth remembering.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: Turn your face to the sun, and the shadows fall behind you.
author: Maori Proverb

quote: What is now proved was once only imagined.
author: William Blake

quote: You are stronger than you think.
author: Unknown

quote: The best dreams happen when you're awake.
author: Cherie Gilderbloom

quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
author: Confucius

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

quote: Keep going. Be all in.

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.

quote: Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.

quote: Change the world by being yourself.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: Stay foolish to stay sane.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
author: Jane Goodall

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.

quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

quote: A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t.

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Your only limit is your mind.
author: Unknown

quote: Courage doesn’t always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying 'I will try again tomorrow.'

quote: We become what we think about.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: You are capable of amazing things.
author: Unknown

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
author: Unknown

quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.

quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

quote: Today is your opportunity to build the tomorrow you want.

quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Small steps in the right direction can turn out to be the biggest step of your life.
author: Unknown

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Consistency is what transforms average into excellence.
author: Unknown

quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Success is the best way to silence the critics.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t tell people your plans. Show them your results.
author: Unknown

quote: Fear kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Fearless Motivation

quote: Work hard in silence, let success make the noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.

quote: It’s never too late to start.
author: Unknown

quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.

quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Unknown

quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.

quote: Great things take time.
author: Unknown

quote: You only fail when you stop trying.
author: Unknown

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right—for you’ll be criticized anyway.

quote: What you do every day matters more than what you do once in a while.

quote: Motivation gets you started. Habit keeps you going.

quote: Your vibe attracts your tribe.
